member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Maps.SfMap.EnableZoom
member.summary: Enables or disables the Zooming feature of the map.
member.remarks: Use this property to enable or disable the zooming feature of the map. "True" value will enable the zoom feature."False" value will disable the zooming feature.
member.value: Type : "True" value enables the Zooming;And "False" will disable the Zooming. Default Value is "True".

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Maps.SfMap.EnablePan
member.summary: Enables or disables the Panning feature of the map.
member.remarks: Use this property to enable or disable the panning feature of the map. "True" value will enable the panning feature."False" value will disable the panning feature.
member.value: Type : "True" value enables the Panning;And "False" will disable the Panning. Default Value is "True".

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Maps.SfMap.MinZoom
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum zoom level of the map.
member.remarks: Use this property to set the minimum zoom level of the map. The map cannot be zoomed out below the MinZoom.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Maps.SfMap.MaxZoom
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum zoom level of the map.
member.remarks: Use this property to set the maximum zoom level of the map. The map cannot be zoomed beyond the MaxZoom value.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Maps.SfMap.ZoomLevel
member.summary: Gets or sets the ZoomLevel for the map.Based the ZoomLevel value the map will be zoomed.
member.remarks: Use this property to zoom in or zoom out the map. If the ZoomLavel is increased then map will be zoomed in.If value is decreases the map will be zoomed out.

member.summary: Gets or Sets MapView

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the latitude and longitude value can be viewed or not.
member.remarks: Use this property to enables or disables the visibility of the Latitude and Longitude values on the top right of the SfMap

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Maps.SfMap.LatitudeLongitudeType
member.summary: Gets or sets display type of LatitudeLangitude values on the top right of the map.
member.remarks:
Use this property to determine how to display the latitude values. There are two types,
DMS and Decimal
Decimal will be shown as normal numbers.
DMS will be shown as Degrees,Minutes and Seconds.

member.value: Type : "True" value enables the Zooming;And "False" will disable the Zooming. Default Value is "True".

Left,Right,Top and Bottom

member.name: M:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Maps.ShapeFileReader.ReadHeader(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Reads and parses the header of the .shp index file
member.remarks:
Byte Position Field Value Type Order ----------------------------------------------------- Byte 0 File Code 9994 Integer Big Byte 4 Unused 0 Integer Big Byte 8 Unused 0 Integer Big Byte 12 Unused 0 Integer Big Byte 16 Unused 0 Integer Big Byte 20 Unused 0 Integer Big Byte 24 File Length File Length Integer Big Byte 28 Version 1000 Integer Little Byte 32 Shape Type Shape Type Integer Little Byte 36 Bounding Box Xmin Double Little Byte 44 Bounding Box Ymin Double Little Byte 52 Bounding Box Xmax Double Little Byte 60 Bounding Box Ymax Double Little Byte 68* Bounding Box Zmin Double Little Byte 76* Bounding Box Zmax Double Little Byte 84* Bounding Box Mmin Double Little Byte 92* Bounding Box Mmax Double Little
* Unused, with value 0.0, if not Measured or Z type
The "Integer" type corresponds to the CLS Int32 type, and "Double" to CLS Double (IEEE 754).
